assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: RTB has previously contributed to an advisory board for Olympus Medical Systems with regard to narrow band imaging cystoscopy. JMF, AO and KGS are all paid employees of Affymetrix UK Ltd and hold shares in Affymetrix (NASDAQ: AFFX). The remaining authors declare no conflict of interest.
